translations: 专题研讨会，讨论会；专题论文集；（尤指古希腊在宴会后举行的）酒会

sentences.sentence: Three hundred years after her death, Merian will be celebrated at an international symposium in Amsterdam this June.
sentences.translation: 在梅里安去世三百年后，今年6月将在阿姆斯特丹举行的国际研讨会上赞颂她。

sentences.sentence: He had been taking part in an international symposium on population.
sentences.translation: 他那时在参加一个有关人口的国际研讨会。

sentences.sentence: I wish the symposium a complete success.
sentences.translation: 我预祝研讨会圆满成功。
